channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The drain surround outside the IMJIN exit has collapsed again., 28th June
item.description:
The drain surround outside the IMJIN exit has collapsed again. Could it be repaired please ? Perhaps would it be worth trying to investigate the underlying structure to see why it keeps breaking down ? Many thanks !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain between 45 and 51 Gretton road Winchcombe is completely blocked.it has not been cleared for so long it is now almost full of stones and debris., 28th June
item.description:
The drain is between 45 and 51 Gretton road and not outside number 51as indicated on the map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Offensive graffiti, 28th June
item.description:
The offensive graffiti has been sprayed overnight (27 Jun 25). It is on the fence of a private residential car park and is openly visible to the public walking and driving past. Use of a swastika is obviously offensive in nature. Unsure if targeted at residents or opportunistic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint John's Avenue, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closure signs causing dangerous obstruction, 28th June
item.description:
3 signs have been erected next to each other in a line warning of a road closure 5 miles ahead. The erected signs reduce the main road to a single carriageway immediately off a roundabout around the corner causing traffic to back up. There are at least 2 other sets of warning signs a few hundred yardsfurther up the road towards cleeve hill 5 miles before the closure, so why the need to cause chaos with the first set on the junction?????
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bentley Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Right turn filter light completely obscured, 27th June
item.description:
Now that the traffic lights have been moved the right turn filter (from CRE on to Pirton Lane) is completely obscured by another sign. It is impossible to see the right turn green filter light when waiting to turn right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
